code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import Expenses from"./components/Expenses";import ExpenseForm from"./components/ExpenseForm";import{getExpenses,addExpense}from"./components/Firebase";import Loader from"./components/Loader";import"./App.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[expenses,setExpenses]=useState();const[isAddingExpense,setIsAddingExpense]=useState(false);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchExpenses=async()=>{try{const expensesData=await getExpenses();setExpenses(expensesData);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchExpenses();},[]);const addExpenseHandler=async expense=>{await addExpense(expense);setExpenses(prevExpenses=>[...prevExpenses,expense]);setIsAddingExpense(false);};const startAddExpenseHandler=()=>{setIsAddingExpense(true);};const cancelAddExpenseHandler=()=>{setIsAddingExpense(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[isAddingExpense&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExpenseForm,{onSaveExpenseData:addExpenseHandler,onCancel:cancelAddExpenseHandler}),!isAddingExpense&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card expense__form",style:{display:"flex",justifyContent:"center"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"expense__button",onClick:startAddExpenseHandler,children:"Add New Expense"})}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card expenses",style:{color:"white",display:"flex","justify-content":"center"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loader,{})}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Expenses,{expenses:expenses})]});};export default App;
